metadata.name: Automa Cavaliere, Modello 149.5
metadata.description:
The animated artwork "Automa Cavaliere, Modello 149.5" is a digital, speculative reconstruction of the Renaissance's lost robot and workshop.

The various elements of the intricate scene are created using different modern approaches - Extruded mathematical shapes, high-poly 3d scans, and AI-generated illustrations based on original sketches from the Italian polymath. All of them are meticulously arranged, depicting Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci's study of natural law and applied mechanics on a warm summer's evening.
